item.title: Crowns next too names
item.dc:creator: @Frozen_Lulz Frozen Lulz
item.description:
@Frozen_Lulz wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:11, topic:324574”][quote author=shrogg link=topic=420952.msg3116388#msg3116388 date=1265012947]
is there a way to make this work for ordinary players?
as in ~ everyone has a icon by their name, not just admins and mods?

[/quote]
yes there is… i already did it to our client. it should work.

just add this:

[code]
if(anInt863 == 0) /*rank? */
{

                    aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2Array1219[0].method361(j4, 16083, 78);/*icon 0-mod- 1 is admin */
                   
                            j4 += 14;
                        }

[/code][/quote]

That would make all players have a Moderator crown?

Read full topic

[quote=“shrogg, post:10, topic:324574”]is there a way to make this work for ordinary players?
as in ~ everyone has a icon by their name, not just admins and mods?[/quote]
yes there is… i already did it to our client. it should work.

just add this:

                            if(anInt863 == 0) /*rank? */
                            {
                               
                        aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2Array1219[0].method361(j4, 16083, 78);/*icon 0-mod- 1 is admin */
                       
                                j4 += 14;
                            }

item.title: Crowns next too names

item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

item.title: Crowns next too names
item.dc:creator: @Frozen_Lulz Frozen Lulz
item.description:
@Frozen_Lulz wrote:

/M,i,K,e on ds + r-s
Picture:

Bluurr

Difficulty: 1

Tested on: DS v16 / Bluurr - Might work on about all if modified correctly //DS v16 is like an 8 line chat I think, and idk what bluurrs is.

Classes modified: Client.java

– DS v16 –

In client.java look for

                s = Class50.method587(-45804, aString1173);

Add under it

[code]

		int j4 = 4;
                        if(anInt863 == 1)
                        {
                            
							aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2Array1219[0].method361(j4, 16083, 78);
                    
                            j4 += 14;
                        }
                        if(anInt863 == 2)
                        {
                         
							aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2Array1219[1].method361(j4, 16083, 78);
                   
                            j4 += 14;
                        }	[/code]

Next search for

class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(255, aString887 + "*", 90, 822, 6 + class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method383(anInt1116, s + ": "));

Change that whole line too

  class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(255, aString887 + "*", 90, 822, 2 + j4 + class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method383(anInt1116, s + ": "));

Next right above that, you’ll see

class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(0, s + ":", 90, 822, 4);

Change 822, 4); too 822, j4);

class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(0, s + ":", 90, 822, j4);

Save, comepile and run

– Bluurrs –

In client.java look for

Next look for

Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method339(112, 0x807660, 505, 0, (byte)4);

Under the }

Add

			int j4 = 4;
                            if(anInt863 == 1)
                            {
                                
								aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2Array1219[0].method361(j4, 16083, 112);
                        
                                j4 += 14;
                            }
                            if(anInt863 == 2)
                            {
                             
								aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2Array1219[1].method361(j4, 16083, 112);
                       
                                j4 += 14;
                            }

Now look for;

class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(UserLoader.namesetcolour, s +":", 124, 822, 4);

Replace that, and the one line under it with

class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(UserLoader.namesetcolour, s +":", 124, 822, j4);
class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(UserLoader.chatsetcolour, aString887 + "*", 124 , 822, 2 + j4  + class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method383(anInt1116, s + ": "));

Save, compile, run

Credits:
Me
Client.java
Notepad++.exe
Windows Explorer

Read full topic
